contentheadline.headline: Wikipedia:WikiProject Gastropods/genus taxobox example with picture

contentrichtext.text: {{italic title}} {{Taxobox | name = ''Helix'' | fossil_range= {{fossil range|Oligocene|Recent}} | image = Snail1web.jpg | image_caption = Garden snail (''[[Helix aspersa]]'') on ''[[Limonium]]'' | regnum = [[Animal]]ia | phylum = [[Mollusca]] | classis = [[Gastropoda]] | unranked_superfamilia = clade [[Heterobranchia]]<br/> informal group [[Pulmonata]]<br/> clade [[Eupulmonata]]<br/> clade [[Stylommatophora]] | superfamilia = [[Helicoidea]] | familia = [[Helicidae]] | genus = '''''Helix''''' | genus_authority = [[Carl Linnaeus|Linnaeus]], 1758 | subdivision_ranks = Species | subdivision = ''See text'' | synonyms = ''[[Cantareus]]''<ref>[http://www.animalbase.uni-goettingen.de/zooweb/servlet/AnimalBase/home/genustaxon?id=2796 ''Genus taxon summary for Cantareus'']. AnimalBase, Last modified 14-11-2006 by F. Welter Schultes, accessed 1 April 2009.</ref> }}
